div.p: WE LEAD WITH PASSION, EMPOWER WITH PROMISE, AND EQUIP FOR EXCELLENCE.
THROUGH THE EFFORTS OF ALL, EVERY STUDENT WILL BE COLLEGE AND CAREER READY, INSPIRED TO ACHIEVE LIFELONG DREAMS.

p.a: Kentucky Department of Education COVID-19 Information Page

span.p: Latest State and National COVID-19 News and Information

div.p: At a time when access to resources is limited due to widespread closures, KYVL research databases are being made available to all Kentucky school districts and public libraries through the end of the school year. Private schools may also request access.
